issue.title: Enable tests which were disabled due to quarkus#50247
issue.body:
### Summary

Reverting the https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite/pull/2658 as it was fixed

Please select the relevant options.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] Dependency update
- [x] Refactoring
- [ ] Backport
- [ ] New scenario (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] This change requires a documentation update
- [ ] This change requires execution against OCP (use `run tests` phrase in comment)
- [ ] This change requires execution with OCP on Aarch64 (use `run arm tests` phrase in comment)

### Checklist:
- [x] Methods and classes used in PR scenarios are meaningful
- [x] Commits are well encapsulated and follow [the best practices](https://cbea.ms/git-commit/)

body: I will take a look at this

issue.title: Fix issue with multiple generated REST invokers
